Class AbstractSecureRedirectStrategy

java.lang.Object
  com.meltmedia.cadmium.servlets.AbstractSecureRedirectStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
SecureRedirectStrategy
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleSecureRedirectStrategy
public abstract class AbstractSecureRedirectStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements SecureRedirectStrategy

Provides an abstract base class for SecureRedirectStrategy implementations.

Author:
Christian Trimble

changeProtocolAndPort

public static java.net.URI changeProtocolAndPort(java.lang.String protocol,
                                                 int port,
                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                          throws java.net.URISyntaxException
Constructs a URI for request and calls changeProtocolAndPort(String, int, URI).

Parameters:
protocol - the new protocol (scheme) in the resulting URI.
port - the new port in the resulting URI, or the default port if -1 is provided.
request - the request to use as the URI template.
Returns:
a new URI object with the updated protocol and port.
Throws:
java.net.URISyntaxException

changeProtocolAndPort

public static java.net.URI changeProtocolAndPort(java.lang.String protocol,
                                                 int port,
                                                 java.net.URI template)
                                          throws java.net.URISyntaxException
Returns a new URI object, based on the specified URI template, with an updated port (scheme) and port. If the port number is -1, then the default port is used in the resulting URI.

Parameters:
protocol - the new protocol (scheme) in the resulting URI.
port - the new port in the resulting URI, or the default port if -1 is provided.
template - the source of all other values for the new URI.
Returns:
a new URI object with the updated protocol and port.
Throws:
java.net.URISyntaxException
